ISSUE.TITLE: Google Analytics. Send "cancel/refund" notifications only if an order was paid
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.10 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Place an order. But don't complete payment 2. Go to admin area and cancel this order 3. Notification will be sent to Google. But it should be send only when an order was paid P.S. Delete and refund events are not supported. We should support them like OrderCancelledEvent

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #2974 Google Analytics. Send "cancel/refund" notifications only if an order was paid
